title: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When attempting to access scoped type hierarchy on binary projects, the functionality appears inaccessible or non-functional, leading to confusion.
OB: Upon pressing F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy fails to display or function as expected.
EB: When pressing F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy should accurately display and function, allowing users to navigate through the project's types.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open a binary project.
2. Select any file within the project.
3. Press the F4 key to access the scoped type hierarchy.
